an10.173:4.1: “Mendicants, you should know bad principles and good principles.
an10.173:4.2: And you should know bad results and good results.
an10.173:4.3: Knowing these things, your practice should follow the good principles with good results.
an10.173:5.1: So what are bad principles? What are good principles? What are bad results? And what are good results?
an10.173:5.3: Killing living creatures is a bad principle.
an10.173:5.4: Not killing living creatures is a good principle.
an10.173:5.5: And the many bad, unwholesome qualities produced by killing living creatures are bad results.
an10.173:5.6: And the many wholesome qualities developed to perfection because of not killing living creatures are good results.
an10.173:6.2: Not stealing is a good principle. …
an10.173:6.3: Sexual misconduct is a bad principle.
an10.173:6.4: Avoiding sexual misconduct is a good principle. …
an10.173:6.6: Not lying is a good principle. …
an10.173:6.7: Divisive speech is a bad principle.
an10.173:6.8: Avoiding divisive speech is a good principle. …
an10.173:6.9: Harsh speech is a bad principle.
an10.173:6.10: Avoiding harsh speech is a good principle. …
an10.173:6.11: Meaningless speech is a bad principle.
an10.173:6.12: Avoiding meaningless speech is a good principle. …
an10.173:6.15: Ill will is a bad principle.
an10.173:6.16: Good will is a good principle. …
an10.173:7.1: Wrong view is a bad principle.
an10.173:7.2: Right view is a good principle.
an10.173:7.3: And the many bad, unwholesome qualities produced by wrong view are bad results.
an10.173:7.4: And the many wholesome qualities developed to perfection because of right view are good results.
an10.173:8.1: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles.
an10.173:8.2: And you should know bad results and good results.
an10.173:8.3: Knowing these things, your practice should follow the good principles with good results.’ That’s what I said, and this is why I said it.”
